key_risks: Regulatory challenges in data privacy and consumer protection
Intense competition with global and regional OTAs
Customer service issues during peak travel seasons
Data security risks and vulnerability to cyber threats
Exposure to future global health crises or travel restrictions
controversies: Occasional customer complaints regarding cancellations and refunds
Potential reputational damage from data breaches or non-compliance
environmental_issues: Sustainability initiatives and eco-friendly travel options
social_issues: Customer service issues impacting customer loyalty
Ensuring a seamless booking experience for users
governance_issues: Maintaining compliance with data privacy laws
